description: Core Feature Engineering: Led the development of critical features for a secure messaging platform, including low-latency VoIP calling, secure Authentication flows, and interactive Message Reactions using Socket.io and LiveKit.
Architectural Leadership: Spearheaded the complete migration of legacy code modules to Clean Architecture, significantly enhancing system scalability and ensuring long-term code maintainability.

Offline-First Strategy: Engineered a high-performance local data layer using ISAR Database, optimizing real-time message caching to provide a seamless and responsive user experience even without connectivity.

Design System & Efficiency: Collaborated with UI/UX designers to establish a Unified Design System and reusable widget library, which substantially reduced development time and ensured UI consistency across the application.
High-Scale Impact: Served as a core developer for a platform with 800k+ downloads and 50k+ MAU, directly contributing to 80% of all major core features.
Ecosystem Management: Developed and maintained the entire Flutter ecosystem, including Client and Doctor apps for both iOS and Android using Bloc and GetX.
Telehealth & E-commerce: Integrated stable Voice/Video features via Agora.io and implemented secure end-to-end shopping flows with integrated payment gateways.
DevOps: Automated deployment to App Store/Google Play via CI/CD pipelines, reducing manual release overhead.
Developed E-commerce and Video Streaming apps and built Platform Channels for native Android/iOS integration.
